00037 void
00038 do_tfgc(const String &config, bool dryrun) {
00039   PropertiesPtr props = new Properties(config);
00040   ConnectionManagerPtr conn_mgr = new ConnectionManager();
00041   DfsBroker::Client *fs = new DfsBroker::Client(conn_mgr, props);
00042   ClientPtr client = new Hypertable::Client("htgc", config);
00043   TablePtr table = client->open_table("METADATA");
00044   master_gc_once(table, fs, dryrun);
00045 }
00046 
00047 } // local namespace

00049 int
00050 main(int ac, char *av[]) {
00051   try {
00052     Config::Desc desc("Usage: htgc [options]\nOptions");
00053     desc.add_options()
00054       ("dryrun,n", "Dryrun, don't modify (delete files etc.)")
00055       ;
00056     Config::init_with_comm(ac, av, &desc);
00057     do_tfgc(Config::cfgfile, Config::varmap.count("dryrun"));
00058   }
00059   catch (Exception &e) {
00060     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00061     return 1;
00062   }
00063   return 0;
00064 }
